trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its software publisher's Authenticode X.509v3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 藉由測試組件的軟體發行者 (Publisher) 的 Authenticode X.509v3 憑證，判斷組件是否屬於程式碼群組。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A code assembly satisfies a publisher membership condition if that code is signed by the specified software publisher.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的軟體發行者簽署該程式碼時，程式碼組件符合發行者成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: By default, code access security (CAS) does not check for <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> evidence.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 不會檢查<xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Unless your computer has a custom code group based on the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition> class, you can improve performance by bypassing Authenticode signature verification.
trans-unit.target: 除非您的電腦有基礎的自訂程式碼群組<xref:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition>類別，可以改善效能，可以略過 Authenticode 簽章驗證。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by configuring the runtime to not provide <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> evidence for CAS.
trans-unit.target: 這可以藉由設定執行階段提供<xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>CA 的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to configure this option and which applications can use it, see the element.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何設定此選項和其應用程式可以使用它，看到項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> that contains the software publisher's public key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />，包含軟體發行者公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> class with the Authenticode X.509v3 certificate that determines membership.
trans-unit.target: 使用判斷成員資格的 Authenticode X.509v3 憑證，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Code satisfies the membership condition if it is signed by the software publisher with the private key that corresponds to the specified public key certificate.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼符合成員資格條件，如果對應於指定的公開金鑰憑證的私密金鑰簽署由軟體發行者。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="certificate" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Authenticode X.509v3 certificate for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來測試成員資格條件的 Authenticode X.509v3 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試成員資格條件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 要進行測試的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的辨識項是否符合成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的辨識項符合成員資格條件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests only <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher> evidence.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員資格條件只測試<xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立成員資格條件的相等複本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前成員資格條件的相同新複本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the publisher certificate from the specified object is equivalent to the publisher certificate contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定物件的發行者憑證是否等同於包含在目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 中的發行者憑證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the publisher certificate from the specified object is equivalent to the publisher certificate contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果來自指定物件的發行者憑證等同於目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 中所包含的發行者憑證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the two publisher certificates are equal, they represent the same <xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 「 發行者 」 憑證相等，則代表相同<xref:System.Security.Policy.Publisher>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不是有效的成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 內容，用來解析 <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 參數不是有效的成員資格條件項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前成員資格條件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前成員資格條件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition" /> 的表示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> context, which is used to resolve <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 內容，用來解析 <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />，建立安全性物件的 XML 編碼方式和它的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PublisherMembershipCondition.Certificate" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。
